Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER followed by Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER occurs in variants that eventually lead to Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are preceded by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE without intermediate rejections
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in comparison to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that directly lead to Request Payment within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants where no budget owner approval is required
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen

Name: Ratio of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER across all cases
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that are part of the shortest successful path to Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases with Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER that result in total Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants that contain exactly one approval step before final supervisor approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Percentage of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the total number of all approval activities (including Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER, and Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' activities
